00017 #include <vector>
00018 
00019 namespace x2d {
00020 
00021     // forward declare kernel to make friends
00022     class kernel;
00023     
00024 namespace input {
00025 
00032     struct transform_touches 
00033     : public std::unary_function<const touch, const touch> 
00034     {        
00035         affine_matrix& m_;
00036      
00040         transform_touches(affine_matrix& m) 
00041         : m_(m) 
00042         {
00043         }
00044         
00045         const touch operator()(const touch& t) 
00046         {
00047             return touch( m_.apply(t.location()), m_.apply(t.prev_location()), t.tap_count(), t.timestamp() );
00048         }
00049     };
00050     
00059     class input_manager
00060     {
00061         friend class kernel;
00062                 
00063     public:
00069         input_manager(kernel& k, bool wt, bool wa)        
00070         : kernel_(k)
00071         , want_touch_(wt)
00072         , want_accel_(wa)
00073         {            
00074         }
00075         
00083         static const std::vector<touch> transform(const std::vector<touch>& touches, affine_matrix& mat) 
00084         {            
00085             std::vector<touch> tr;
00086             tr.reserve(touches.size());
00087             
00088             std::transform(touches.begin(), touches.end(), std::back_inserter(tr), transform_touches(mat));
00089             
00090             return tr;
00091         }
00092         
00093     private:
00098         void on_touches_began(const std::vector<touch>& touches);    
00099         
00104         void on_touches_moved(const std::vector<touch>& touches);
00105         
00110         void on_touches_ended(const std::vector<touch>& touches);
00111         
00112         kernel&     kernel_;
00113         bool        want_touch_;
00114         bool        want_accel_;
00115     };
00116     
00117 } // namespace input
00118 } // namespace x2d
00119 using namespace x2d::input;
00120 
00121 #endif // __X2D_INPUT_MANAGER_H__
